edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance

Class Distances

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.Distances

  • public class Distances
extends Object
    Class containing factory methods to instantiate various common distance functions that implement the DistanceFunction functional interface. These distance functions are compatible with the KDTree class. The Distance class itself cannot be instantiated.
    Author:
    Justin Horvitz
